cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Fully made-up beds with fresh linens, cozy duvet and bedside lights. Central heating. Super-modern single sex shared bathrooms, roomy kitchen and dining, amazing indoor and outdoor breakout areas. FREE Unlimited WiFi. Gym, Sauna and Hot Tub available.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 24th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
